description: A single full-page panel. Present day at the Jutas monument surrounded by birch trees. A high-school teacher gestures toward the bronze relief of Döbeln while students listen attentively. Sunlight filters through the leaves, uniting past and present in the same quiet landscape.
narration: More than two centuries later, Jutas still speaks — of resolve, of sacrifice, of Finland’s turning point.
info: Page 12 – Modern Time. PageType: Hero (1 panel). Scene: modern-day students and teacher at the Jutas monument, bright daylight.
